Class PositionableElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.homer.kernel.PositionableElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeElement, EntityElement, HomerWidgetElement

    public abstract class PositionableElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract definition of elements.

        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the element cannot be added to the container.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(int x,
                        int y,
                        int width,
                        int height)
                 throws IllegalActionException
        Set the location of this element's representation.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the top-left corner.
        y - The y position of the top-left corner.
        width - The width of the representation.
        height - The height of the representation.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the location cannot be set.
        See Also:
        getLocation()

      • setTab

            throws IllegalActionException
        Set the tab attribute in the underlying named object wrapped by this element.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag identifier of the tab this element belongs to.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the tab cannot be set.
